thread.title: Blind woodchuck gets new family after near death experience (13 Photos)
thread.title_full: Blind woodchuck gets new family after near death experience (13 Photos)

author: Matt
title: Blind woodchuck gets new family after near death experience (13 Photos)
text:
1 
This furry little friend is Coco the woodchuck, and she has had quite the near death experience. 
H/T boredpanda 2 
Found paralysed, in a family’s yard, the female groundhog was so close to the end that birds were literally circling above her head. 3 4 
The family that found her called a local wildlife rehabber, Molly Ryan, who took her in and started the long and arduous process of getting Coco’s life back on track. 5 
Due to Coco’s weak state, she would often need 24-hour attention, which culminated in her eventually spending nights in bed with Molly. Advertisement Advertisement 6 
“She would snuggle up right by me and make sure part of her body was touching me all night” 7 
Unfortunately, just before Molly was considering releasing Coco back into the wild, she noticed that her fluffy adoptee seemed to have problems seeing. 8 
“I noticed she held her eyes at half-mast or sometimes not open at all” 
A trip to the vet confirmed her worse fears: Coco was blind. 9 
Knowing that a blind woodchuck wouldn’t last long in the wild, Molly adopted Coco into the Ryan family. 10 Advertisement 11 
“There is nothing that makes getting out of bed harder than having to leave a gently snoring round fluffball of snuggling woodchuck” 
I can only take your word for it, Molly! 12
